ALL_TEAM_MEMBERS: Aliens call themselves 'The Assembled' - 17 spacefaring civilizations
Have monitored Earth for 473 years (since Renaissance)
OPTION 1: Achieve 85% global democratic consensus for contact = partnership, technology, knowledge
OPTION 2: Cannot achieve consensus or reject = permanent isolation, no further contact
12 months deadline until Voyager arrives (October 17 next year)
85% threshold based on survival analysis - civilizations that can't unite at this stage destroy themselves
Technology offered includes: lifespan extension (3x), FTL communication, clean energy, medical advances
Marcus_Reid: Sees the impossibility of achieving 85% consensus
Recognizes world is more divided since going public
Sofia_Navarro: Believes they must bypass governments and go to people directly
Invokes brother's wisdom about believing you can finish the journey
Yuki_Tanaka: Wants to involve social movements, NGOs, educators, artists

world_state.time: ~6 months after Chapter 15 (October, ~12 months before Voyager arrival)
world_state.public_awareness: About to learn of the binary choice
world_state.institutional_awareness: Governments already fighting for control before knowing about choice

option_1.requirement: 85% global democratic consensus to accept contact
option_1.reward: Partnership with Assembled, technology transfer, knowledge sharing, medical advances, clean energy, FTL communication, extended lifespan

option_2.trigger: Failure to achieve 85% consensus or active rejection
option_2.consequence: Permanent isolation, no further contact, must solve problems alone
option_2.implication: Increased likelihood of self-destruction without help

the_choice.rationale: Species that cannot unite before advanced technology invariably destroy themselves
